name: Lilly Lashes Lite Faux Mink Lashes
about: What it is:A collection of natural-looking vegan lashes to softly add length, volume, and gentle curl for a subtle, elegant look...Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan..What Else You Need to Know:Miami Lite is a lighter, more natural version of the lash you already know and love, the bestselling 3D-style Miami. Get a more subtle look with her sister lash, Miami Lite, perfect for any glam and all-day wear. Diamonds is a round lash that adds delicate length and volume to the center of the eye, creating a natural, soft feminine look.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Curl your lashes and apply mascara before applying your false lashes..-Carefully remove the lashes from the tray..-Pull from the band of one end of the lash, never pulling on the lashes themselves..-Hold the lash up to your eye to measure for sizing..-If the lash is longer than your natural eye shape, trim the lash accordingly, cutting it from the inner or outer corner..-Place a thin layer of non-permanent glue on the band of the lash, allow it to dry for 30 seconds, then place the lash on top of your natural lash line..-Allow lashes to dry in place.

shades.shade_descriptor: round lash style, most complimentary to round, hooded, upturned & almond eye shapes
round lash style, complimentary to all eye shapes
